idea:
About Us


Flying Color Ads & Marketing Co., based in Mumbai is a startup Exhibition Stands Design and Construction company. We undertake projects across the nation. Not only Exhibitions, our range of activities include Interior Design and Fit-outs, Graphics, Digital printing, Branding, Advertising, Audio Visual Production, Photo shoot & Ad Films, Conference and Events Management.


What we do :

1. Cost Effective Ideas & Design Concepts

2. Fabrication of Custom, Shell Scheme and Upgraded Shell scheme stands

3. Turnkey Interior Solutions – Commercial, Industrial and Residential

4. Projects Planning & Production

5. Logo & Digital Graphics

6. Advertising/Marketing

7. Corporate Events and Conferences 

8. Digital Media

9. Brand Management

10. Digital Printing

11. Audio Visual Production

12. Photo shoot & Ad Films

13. Promotional Items.
name: Flying Color Ads And Marketing Co.

idea:
We, Chotiwala Foods and Machines, are a well respected name in the food processing industry. We are renowned to be the one who delivers clients with top class assortment of Namakpara Making Machines, Papad Making Machines, Chapati Making Machines, Sev Puri Machines, etc. These and many other machines are manufactured in our units as per the standards of the food processing domain. Each of the machine is assembled with perfection to ensure overall perfection. Further, our Thane (Maharashtra, India) based company also makes sure that each of the offered machines is delivered to clients in adequate packaging along with the essential paper work as well as documentations.


About Us :-

In the food processing industry machines have become the prime savior. They helps thousands of industrial players in creating their recipes into quality products with speed. To provide such help to clients across India, we, Chotiwala Foods and Machines, offers a wide gamut of Food Processing Machines to clients. Our specialty lies in designing, assembling, finishing and delivering top quality Papad Making Machines, Chakli Making Machines, Chapati Making Machines, Namakpara Making Machines, Ninki Making Machine, Sev Puri Machines, Pani Puri Machines, etc. These machines are offered to clients in a variety of customizable physical and mechanical specifications. Affordable prices also benefit customers immensely. Being a client centric manufacturer and trader, we make sure that all of our offerings meet high expectations of our clients. For this, we check these carefully prior to their delivery.


Why to Choose Our Machines?


Our machines are the best one can find in the competitive Indian market. The range that we bring forth consists of zero physical as well as mechanical defects. Our Food Processing Machines are appreciated nationwide for durable service life. Throughout their service life, our machines require minimal maintenance and repair. These machines gives their users a high return on investment as these help in processing food products with speed and perfection. Some other attributes to our machine's growing preference in the market are:

These are easy to clean which helps users in maintaining hygiene.

They are seamlessly finished and confirmed to have non-corrosive bodies.

These machines conserves energy as an optimum level of energy is required for operation.


Our company has been supporting a long list of customers working in the food processing industry since our incorporation. We have offered them with best Food Processing Machines like Ninki Making Machines, Fafda Making Machines, etc. All of such machines are manufactured by us at our hi-tech infrastructure base using quality components and parts. Further, these are delivered to clients on time. We also render top class technical services along with premium consultations to clients regarding the machines which suits their needs the best. Our enterprise also succeeds in helping customers with our 24*7 customer support through which we resolve all of their 'Product Related Qualities'.
name: CHOTIWALA FOODS AND MACHINES

idea:
BGN MEDTEX (INDIA) PRIVATE LIMITED

ABOUT US: A Woman Entrepreneur with a clear Vision & Mission started a small enterprise in 2014 with sustainable packaging solutions as one of the focus areas. After structuring the business successfully, she decided to move from entrepreneurship to Private Limited company.

BGN Medtex is Conceptualized by experts with more than 25 years of Sales, Marketing & profit centre experience, strong financial background in order to deliver value for money, Expertise in medical healthcare industry, Pre & Post Launch activities in diverse businesses.

Managing Director:

Vipan K Dewan: With more than 12 years of P&L experience, he has vast experience in general management and handling multiple businesses with healthy balance sheet. His brief profile is:

Doctorate of Philosophy (PhD) on Indian Medical Devices Industry

MBA in Marketing, DBA, Diploma in Business Management, BE in E/TC from College of Engineering

4 Pillar of BGN

1) Healthcare: BGN is handling medical devices in various institutes by liaison with various medical devices companies. It also handles the herbal business distribution in Maharashtra for Jindal Naturecare Limited, Bangalore. It has its own retail outlets in Mumbai with clinics of Ayurveda doctors.

2) Packaging: BGN was the organization behind new innovation of “ Handmade Paper made from Linen Waste”. We are providing lot of innovative packaging solutions in Textile Industry and are working with leading brands in India and abroad. We do design, printing and outsourcing of various items used in textile industry including handmade paper bags. Few

3) Corporate Gifting: BGN has been into corporate gifting to lot of organizations in healthcare, textile and other industries. With more than 1000 options in gifting, it provide a vast range in corporate gifting from office musts, attire, electronic, handmade paper products, bags, trophies

4) Safety Products: BGN entered contract with Karam Industries for industrial safety products. Along with it, BGN developed few products with Railways for PPE kits, started trading these kits making customized safety kits for personal use including mask, sanitizer, soap, face shield etc.
name: BGN Medtex (India) Private Limited

idea: Eyewearlabs was founded with a rebellious spirit and a great objective: to offer Innovative and Technologically Advance Eyewear at a revolutionary price. Going forward after the launch of the website, We aim to increase the spectrum of eyewear products we offer. “Bringing in quality eyewear products, ranging from Anti Reflective, Hydrophobic Lenses to Sunglasses to Advance Digital Protection Glass with built in Blue Ray Block or Safety Night Driving Glasses, this will be the main focus of our team here at Eyewear Labs. Website aims to be the standard for quality and trust.
name: EYEWEARLABS INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
